mapper.insert: insert into(emp_no, dept_no, position_no, emp_id, emp_pwd, emp_original_filename, emp_name, emp_gender, emp_birth, emp_email, emp_tel, emp_postcode, emp_address, emp_detail_address, emp_write_date) values(seq_emp_no.nextval, seq_dept_no.nextval, seq_position_no.nextval,#{emp_id}, #{emp_pwd}, #{emp_original_filename}, #{emp_name}, #{emp_gender}, #{emp_birth}, #{emp_email}, #{emp_tel}, #{emp_postcode}, #{emp_address}, #{emp_detail_address}, default)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employee WHERE emp_id = #{emp_id}
